## Pull request

_description_

### Ticket

- https://github.com/valantic/frontend-utils/issues/xxx

### Testing

- run `npm ci`
- run `npm test`

### Checklist

- [ ] Added a test for anything which I have created or fixed.
- [ ] Added a new release note.
- [ ] Made sure everything is backwards compatible or has a breaking change note.

## Review/Test checklist

- [ ] Did review code and documentation.
- [ ] Did check the CHANGELOG.md file.
